${ModID}:RapidImprovisationQuest.TITLE: 급속 진화
${ModID}:RapidImprovisationQuest.DESCRIPTION: #y퀘스트 #y귀속 #y탈바꿈 과 #y번데기 를 얻습니다. 다음 전투에서, 두 퀘스트 귀속 카드와 두 카드가 섞어넣은 카드를 모두 사용하십시오.
${ModID}:RapidImprovisationQuest.AUTHOR: Lua Viper

${ModID}:PrioritiesQuest.TITLE: 우선순위
${ModID}:PrioritiesQuest.DESCRIPTION: 이번 막의 다음 엘리트가 노예 관리자로 교체됩니다. 적들을 한번에 하나씩, 왼쪽에서 오른쪽으로 처치하십시오.
${ModID}:PrioritiesQuest.AUTHOR: Lua Viper
${ModID}:PrioritiesQuest.REWARD: 이 전투의 카드 보상이 모두 강화됩니다.

${ModID}:SwishSwishSwishQuest.TITLE: Swish Swish Swish (DEPRECATED)
${ModID}:SwishSwishSwishQuest.DESCRIPTION: Make #b3 unique slashing motions in a single combat.
${ModID}:SwishSwishSwishQuest.AUTHOR: Lua Viper
EXTRA_TEXT: #yHorizontal: Bane, Dash, Die Die Die, Flash of Steel, Quick Slash, Riddle with Holes, Ritual Dagger, Shiv, Strike NL #yVertical: Bane (poisoned), Poisoned Stab NL #yDiagonal: Dramatic Entrance, Finisher, Glass Knife, Panache, Slice, Sneaky Strike, Unload NL #yHeavy: All-Out Attack, Backstab, Choke, Eviscerate, Glass Knife, Grand Finale, Letter Opener, Masterful Stab, Predator

${ModID}:PainIndexQuest.TITLE: Pain Index (DEPRECATED)
${ModID}:PainIndexQuest.DESCRIPTION: Conduct research on the denizens of the Spire by getting hit with 7 unique attacks or elemental effects.
${ModID}:PainIndexQuest.AUTHOR: Lua Viper

${ModID}:HydrateQuest.TITLE: Hydrate! (DEPRECATED)
${ModID}:HydrateQuest.DESCRIPTION: End #b8 consecutive combats with no Potions.
${ModID}:HydrateQuest.AUTHOR: Lua Viper
